Uses of Interface
iaik.apps.util.passphrase.PassphrasePrompt

  • Packages that use PassphrasePrompt 
    Package Description
    iaik.apps.util.passphrase
    This package contains interface and the default implementations for passphrase dialogs, which are used for PINs as well.
    iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider
    This package is the main package and includes the JCE provider implementation class, which is IAIKPkcs11.

    • Uses of PassphrasePrompt in iaik.apps.util.passphrase

      Classes in iaik.apps.util.passphrase that implement PassphrasePrompt 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PassphraseConsoleDialog
      A dialog for prompting a passphrase via the console.
      class  PassphraseDialog
      A simple dialog for prompting a passphrase.
      class  PassphraseFrameDialog
      A simple dialog for prompting a passphrase.
      class  PassphraseHolder
      A simple object for passing a constant passphrase or PIN.
      Constructors in iaik.apps.util.passphrase with parameters of type PassphrasePrompt 
      Constructor and Description
      NewPassphraseHolder(PassphrasePrompt oldPassphrasePrompt, char[] newPassphrase)
      Constructor taking the new passphrase and a prompt for getting the old passphrase if required.

    • Uses of PassphrasePrompt in iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider

      Methods in iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider that return PassphrasePrompt 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PassphrasePrompt DefaultLoginManager.getPassphrasePrompt()
